page.title: 04Brackley - general survey
page.content: One afternoon we asked 22 people some questions about Brackley. Not everybody answered them all. Most of the people we asked were housewives doing their shopping or people who did not go to work. Lots of the people we asked thought that Brackley was very nice because of the local people's friendliness. If someone were moving to Brackley they would need to know about shops and schools. Most people thought that both of these were good. Some said that books for schools are not chosen very well. Some people said that upper schools are too big. We asked if there were enough jobs here. Two said there were enough for the size of Brackley but 17 said there were not. Everyone we asked said that there was too much traffic noise. It will be better when the by-pass comes.
